article_title: Israeli authorities say three Israeli police killed in West Bank.
sentence: Israeli  authorities  say  three  Israeli  police  killed  in  West  Bank.

article_title: Israeli authorities say three Israeli police killed in West Bank.
sentence: Three  Israeli  police  officers  -  two  men  and  one  woman  -  have  been  killed  after  their  vehicle  was  shot  at  near  the  city  of  Hebron  in  the  occupied  West  Bank,  Israeli  authorities  say.

article_title: Israeli authorities say three Israeli police killed in West Bank.
sentence: Two  of  the  officers  were  declared  dead  at  the  scene  near  the  Tarkumiya  crossing.

article_title: Israeli authorities say three Israeli police killed in West Bank.
sentence: A  third  officer  was  taken  to  hospital  by  helicopter  but  later  died.
